i1.name: Dream-Laden Bough
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Lillia's''' [[champion ability|abilities]] apply ''Dream Dust'', dealing {{as|5% of the target's {{sti|'''maximum''' health}}}} as {{as|magic damage}} over 3 seconds, capped at {{pp|40 to 100}} damage against {{tip|monster|monsters}}.
i1.descriptionHtml: Innate: Lillia's champion ability apply Dream Dust, dealing 5% of the target's maximum health as magic damage over 3 seconds, capped at 40undefined âˆ’ 100undefined (based on level) damage against monsters.
i1.notes:
* {{ais|Lilting Lullaby|Lillia}} application does not apply ''Dream Dust'', but its triggering damage does.
* ''Dream Dust'' is applied even if the target takes no damage from an ability, e.g. by being {{tip|shield|shielded}} or {{tip|invulnerability|invulnerable}}, but not when the ability hit is prevented in the first place (e.g. {{tip|spell shield}}).
* Each tick of damage occurs every {{fd|0.5}} seconds, up to 6 ticks.

w1.name: Watch Out! Eep!
w1.target_range: {{tt|500|Range for center of AoE}} / {{tt|350|Maximum dash range}}
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lillia''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} to 150 units in front of the target area over {{tt|{{fd|0.759}} seconds|0.75 seconds, but rounded to the next game tick}}, though not through terrain, and deals {{as|magic damage}} in an area around the target spot. Enemies hit within the center are dealt {{ccs|200% increased damage|magic}}.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Lillia dashes to 150 units in front of the target area over 0.759 seconds, though not through terrain, and deals magic damage in an area around the target spot. Enemies hit within the center are dealt Unknown value: ccs 200% increased damage magic.
Watch Out! Eep! deals 50% damage to minions.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|70 to 130}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|70*3 to 130*3}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}}}}
{{st|Minion Damage|{{ap|35 to 65}} {{as|(+ 15% AP)}}|Maximum Minion Damage|{{ap|35*3 to 65*3}} {{as|(+ 45% AP)}}}}
w1.notes:
* '''Lillia''' dashes to her target location over {{tt|{{fd|0.627}} to {{fd|0.759}} seconds|0.6 to 0.75 seconds, but rounded to the next game tick}}, but cannot move before the strike goes off at {{fd|0.759}} seconds, regardless.
* '''Lillia''' can hop over the edges of certain walls despite the ability being unable to traverse terrain.

effects.str:

• Minion Damage: (+ 15% AP)
  • Maximum Minion Damage: (+ 45% AP)

e1.name: Swirlseed
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lillia''' lobs a seed at the target area that rolls forward indefinitely. The seed detonates upon colliding with an enemy or terrain upon landing or while rolling, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies in a cone, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 3 seconds and {{tip|sight|revealing}} them for 2 seconds.
''Swirlseed'' will cast at max range if cast beyond that. The spot at which the seed will last collide with terrain is highlighted to '''Lillia''' while it is rolling.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Lillia lobs a seed at the target area that rolls forward indefinitely. The seed detonates upon colliding with an enemy or terrain upon landing or while rolling, dealing magic damage to enemies in a cone, slowing them for 3 seconds and revealing them for 2 seconds.
Swirlseed will cast at max range if cast beyond that. The spot at which the seed will last collide with terrain is highlighted to Lillia while it is rolling.
e1.notes:
* ''Swirlseed's'' origin is determined from '''Lillia's''' position at the start of cast, the rolling direction is determined from '''Lillia's''' position at the end of cast (when the projectile is created, not when the seed starts rolling).
* {{tip|Spell shield}} does not prevent the seed from detonating thus striking nearby targets.
* {{tip|Projectile|Projectile destroying effects}} will still make the rolling seed detonate upon colliding with them, but not when the initial arcing missile is destroyed.
** If {{cai|Unbreakable|Braum}} blocks the initial projectile, it is destroyed and deals 0 damage to him, as well as not triggering the cone-shaped area of effect.
[[File: Swirlseed collision indicator.png|175px|thumb|left|Collision indicator]]

effects.str:

r1.name: Lilting Lullaby
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lillia''' casts a magical lullaby over all targetable enemy {{tip|champions}} affected by {{ai|Dream-Laden Bough|Lillia|Dream Dust}}, which {{tt|arrives after {{fd|0.3}} seconds|fixed travel time missile}} and renders them {{tip|drowsy}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, {{tip|slow|slowing}} by 25%, increasing to up to 50% over the duration. After the duration, they fall {{tip|sleep|asleep}} for a few seconds.
The next non-{{tip|persistent damage|persistent}} non-{{tip|minion}} damage taken by the {{tip|sleep|sleeping}} targets consumes the debuff to deal additional {{as|magic damage}}.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Lillia casts a magical lullaby over all targetable enemy champions affected by Dream Dust, which arrives after 0.3 seconds and renders them drowsy for 1.5 seconds, slowing by 25%, increasing to up to 50% over the duration. After the duration, they fall asleep for a few seconds.
The next non-persistent non-minion damage taken by the sleeping targets consumes the debuff to deal additional magic damage.
r1.notes:
* The {{tip|sleep}} debuff is named ''Shhh.. They're Asleep''.
* '''Lillia''' can move during ''Lilting Lullaby's'' cast time.
* The additional {{as|magic damage}} dealt is accredited to '''Lillia''' and benefits from her {{sti|{{as|magic penetration}}}}.
* ''Lilting Lullaby'' does not apply to targets that become invalid (whether by becoming {{tip|untargetable}} or {{tip|death|dying}}) during the cast time or while the projectile is traveling (which takes approximately {{fd|0.3}} seconds to reach the target). There is no compensation if none of the intended targets were affected by the ability.
* ''Lilting Lullaby's'' application does not trigger aggro from {{tip|turret|turrets}}, only its triggering damage does.
** {{ai|Dream-Laden Bough|Lillia|Dream Dust's}} persistent damage will still cause '''Lillia''' to trigger turret aggro, unless she casts ''Lilting Lullaby'' right before it runs out.
* ''Lilting Lullaby'' cannot be cast without a marked target.
